header-sub-text: Today, in all sectors, things are easier and faster with social identity. Moreover, if your business has a name in the web world, you have a business. I am here to introduce you and your business to the web world and help you catch the advantages, be it customer potential or accessibility.
education-description: I graduated from Çukurova University Computer Engineering 2018. I am doing a master's degree in the same department.
experience-description: During my graduation, I made websites, web projects and android software as a freelancer. I started working in the private sector and still continue.
